DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze effect Evidence-Based Medicine electronic Decision Support ( EBMeDS ) automatic reminder primary health care . Hypothesis ( 1 ) intervention group total number EBMeDS reminder decrease compare control group . Hypothesis ( 2 ) intervention group quality measure increase faster compare control group follow-up time .
